definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: They often unconsciously punish themselves by sabotaging their own success.
sentences.chinese: 他们常常无意识地通过破坏自己的成功来惩罚自己。

sentences.english: Haynes wasn't the first neuroscientist to explore unconscious decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 海恩斯并非第一个探究无意识思考决策的神经学家。

sentences.english: I know, you are very upset at your unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，你对自己的无意识很是不满。

sentences.english: The reactions of the amygdala are so quick that they are for all intents automatic.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核的反应是如此之快以至于它们几乎是无意识的。

sentences.english: People feeling nervous or unsure of themselves will unconsciously take a guarded stance.
sentences.chinese: 心中不安或不自信的人会无意识地采用防御式的站姿。

sentences.english: Is the intent from the unconscious addiction and desire to escape the pain?
sentences.chinese: 意想是来自于无意识瘾性并渴望去逃避痛苦的吗？

sentences.english: Men and women have different unconscious reproductive motives.
sentences.chinese: 男女有着不同的无意识的生殖动机。

sentences.english: We should learn to let our unconscious handle the complicated things, " Dijksterhuis says."
sentences.chinese: 我们应该学会让我们的无意识去处理一些复杂的事情。

sentences.english: would be to teach ordinary Americans how to control their unconscious drives.
sentences.chinese: 将是去教授普通美国人，如何控制他们的无意识驱力。

sentences.english: Everything we do is influenced by unconscious processes and our environment, he added.
sentences.chinese: 我们所做的事情都受无意识过程和环境的影响。

sentences.english: The frame has been fixed against unintentional lifting.
sentences.chinese: 机架已经固定以防无意识的起吊。

sentences.english: An indescribable sorrow filled his heart and he automatically turned his head round.
sentences.chinese: 心头怅仍到不可言说，只是无意识地把身子乱转。

sentences.english: Now, according to Freud, most of this is unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 根据弗洛伊德的理论，人格结构的大部分是无意识的。
我们常常无意识的这么作。

sentences.english: This is the unconscious dance of the guru.
sentences.chinese: 这就是古鲁的无意识之舞。

sentences.english: Mechanized energy can be equated with non-consciousness as a result.
sentences.chinese: 作为结果，机械可以以无意识来被平衡。
